Docs.summary: Specifies a class that will add extra attributes to the metadata store.

remarks.format:
## Remarks IRegisterMetadata types provide a way to encapsulate the association of design-time attributes to run-time types in a loosely coupled fashion. An application hosting the [!INCLUDE[wfd1](~/add/includes/wfd1-md.md)] can use the IRegisterMetadata interface to register the attributes for the activity. For instance, [!INCLUDE[vs2010](~/add/includes/vs2010-md.md)] searches for types that implement IRegisterMetadata when assemblies that contain these types are loaded in addition to also looking for types in the *.design assemblies.
